## a.model() function

A data model that creates a matching Amazon DynamoDB table and provides create, read (list and get), update, delete, and subscription APIs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function model<T extends ModelFields>(fields: T): ModelType<{
    fields: T;
    identifier: ModelDefaultIdentifier;
    secondaryIndexes: [];
    authorization: [];
    disabledOperations: [];
}>;
```
